name: Block Fit 3D - Classic Block Puzzle
description:
Block Fit 3D is an amazing puzzle game. It's very simple, addictive and enjoyable. This new type of gameplay differs from traditional puzzle because it takes away the pressure of higher level speed.

There is no time limit to play, simply filling out a row or column to eliminate blocks to increase your score. Get into the powerful magical space while continuous eliminating multiple lines, even get ready for surprise bonus!

If you are looking for something to play with your friends, Block Fit 3D is great for anyone who likes simple and basic high-score game that kill time and challenge your puzzle skills. You get to share in this excitement, challenge your friends and have fun together.

Beat your high score, get more bonus and never give up!

Key features:
◉ Unique 3D design
◉ Excellent display
◉ Impressive magical space
◉ Insanely simple and addictive
◉ Piano background music & Rock 'n' roll music
◉ Brilliant gaming experience

Play at anytime, anywhere, no WI-FI needed.

Any feedback or good suggestions?
